basics.name: Josh Fisher
basics.label: Development Operations Engineer
basics.summary: Over the past 5 years I have continuously challenged myself with new languages, frameworks and methodologies. I had the first legal Bitcoin ATM in the state of Oregon in 2014, since then I have been living and breathing the technology and software underlying crypto currency and the new financial markets.

work.summary: Launched the first legally approved by the State of Oregon Division of Fincial Regulation in 2014, exited and sold the machines and business process in early 2017.
highlights: Access control with HSM (Yubikey) and OpenPGP used as SSH
Security of bitcoin hot-wallet on Amazon AWS with zero hacks or thefts in 3 years of operations with significant bitcoin value targets
2,500 BTC total sell through volume before sale

work.summary: General title and due diligence rerporting of all mineral rights, as well as surface rights for energy industry production or supply line purposes.
highlights: S-T-R From Government issued patent title
Confidentiality of ownership chain in surface ownership reports

work.summary: General land invetment trust, bought distressed properties in 2008 crash to rehabilitate and rent long-term, management is overseen by my younger brother whom lives in OKC.
highlights: Resource allocation for long-term maintenance and utility operations
